title: IHCL says it recorded 'industry leading' pipeline of hotels in the past one year
description: Puneet Chhatwal, managing director and CEO of IHCL said IHCL has witnessed a 'tremendous' year of growth with 'unprecedented' momentum of portfolio expansion.
